name: Home Upgrade Services
description: No-cost installation services for income-eligible single-family homeowners to convert gas appliances to electric; includes assessment, pre-vetted contractor, permits, rebates, and fixed pricing
fullDescription: Peninsula Clean Energy's Home Upgrade Services provides no-cost electrification for income-eligible homeowners, converting gas appliances to electric with a full-service approach from assessment to installation.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free in-home energy assessment
- No-cost installation of electric appliances
- Heat pump water heaters and HVAC systems
- Induction cooktops and electric dryers
- Electrical panel upgrades if needed
- All permits and inspections handled
- Pre-vetted, quality contractors
- Fixed, transparent pricing
howToGetIt:
1. Complete online eligibility survey
2. Must own single-family home in San Mateo County
3. Meet income guidelines (typically 80% AMI or below)
4. Schedule free in-home assessment
5. Review and approve recommended upgrades
6. PCE coordinates installation and rebates
keywords: home upgrade, electrification, free, Peninsula Clean Energy, PCE, San Mateo, heat pump, induction, electric dryer, low-income
